quest.name: A Cry for Help
journal:
 Quest Sync
Billfort is looking for someone with time on their hands.
objectives: Obtain a cutting of dawn faetail.
Deliver the faetail cutting and nectar to Fae-Hann.

dialogue.name: BILLFORT
dialogue.text: You there. You look as if you could use something to occupy yourself with.

dialogue.name: BILLFORT
dialogue.text: I received this flyer soliciting help at Spagyrics, but I am far too busy with my own duties to contribute. It seemed a shame to not at least pass it on, though─they do good work there. Vital work.

dialogue.name: BILLFORT
dialogue.text: If you're interested in offering your assistance, you'll find Spagyrics just southwest of here. Fae-Hann should be more than willing to explain the specific tasks that volunteering would entail.

dialogue.name: BILLFORT
dialogue.text: I do hope you will consider lending a hand at Spagyrics. The whole of the Crystarium depends on its services, you know.

dialogue.name: FAEHANN
dialogue.text: You don't appear to have any gaping wounds... Are you here for a tincture, perhaps? If so, I'm afraid it will take some time to prepare.

dialogue.name: FAEHANN
dialogue.text: You've come in answer to our plea for help? Oh, thank goodness! We don't have nearly enough manpower to keep up with the demand for poultices and restoratives at present, and I constantly feel as if I'm mere moments away from losing my wits from the stress of it.

dialogue.name: FAEHANN
dialogue.text: In fact, are you available to start right away? I am in urgent need of someone who might go to the Hortorium for more dawn faetail cuttings and nectar. If you are unsure of what those look like, never fear─Leinneil will direct you to the correct plant.

dialogue.name: FAEHANN
dialogue.text: Dawn faetails are large, glowing herbs─though I realize that applies to many of the plants growing in the Hortorium. You really ought to ask Leinneil to show you.

dialogue.name: LEINNEIL
dialogue.text: Oho, a new assistant at Spagyrics, are you? And what can I help you with today?

dialogue.name: LEINNEIL
dialogue.text: Ah, dawn faetails. Naturally. Those are the brightly colored, brushlike plants that you see─I recommend you take a cutting from the tallest one. We've been quite successful in encouraging their growth of late, so you needn't worry about taking what you require.

dialogue.name: LEINNEIL
dialogue.text: As for the nectar, you'll need to ask one of the researchers at the cauldron for that. It's a bit too difficult for an amateur to extract.

dialogue.name: LEINNEIL
dialogue.text: Since it seems that it's your first time encountering them, it may interest you to hear that the dawn faetail is one of the few plants to have survived from the time before the Flood.

dialogue.name: LEINNEIL
dialogue.text: Then, they were kept solely for their beauty─which I agree is quite remarkable. In the time since the Flood, however, we have experimented with various cultivars to intensify their healing properties, and they are now used in a variety of medicines.

dialogue.name: LEINNEIL
dialogue.text: I hope that gives you a bit of an appreciation for the sort of work done here─though I apologize for the digression. I'm sure you will be wanting to get back to Spagyrics as soon as possible.

dialogue.name: LEINNEIL
dialogue.text: I recommend that you take a cutting from the tallest of the faetails. One of the researchers at the cauldron can provide you with the nectar.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER03343
dialogue.text: From Spagyrics, are you? One moment, please─this is a crucial moment for observing the results of this experiment.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER03343
dialogue.text: Hmm... There appears to be very little difference in how these fertilizer components interact. It is a delicate balance, so perhaps our measurements were off, but we should also consider whether it's the temperature that's causing the problem...

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER03343
dialogue.text: Ah, well. Faetail nectar, was it? Here you are. Have care that you put it to good use.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER03343
dialogue.text: Why do we conduct experiments using such a large cauldron, you ask? For reasons, of course. Reasons.

dialogue.name: FAEHANN
dialogue.text: Welcome back! Doubly so, if you have what we need.

dialogue.name: FAEHANN
dialogue.text: Perfect. I'm sure we shall be putting this to use right away─the patients haven't stopped coming, that's for certain.

dialogue.name: FAEHANN
dialogue.text: Our work can be grueling, I admit. It is for that reason that many who arrive with a mind to join our ranks find themselves quitting soon after. Thus are we so perpetually wanting for personnel...

dialogue.name: FAEHANN
dialogue.text: It's work worth doing, though, and I was glad to have your help with it today. Thank you.
